current.name: Mike Smith
current.blurb: My research interests are focussed on how the interactions between particles affect the properties of non-equilibrium flows. This spans colloidal and granular systems, both with and without wetting liquids. I'm particularly interested in questions related to the arrest of flowing matter: glassy dynamics, jamming, fracture

current.name: Matthew Hayes
current.blurb: Matthew is working on an Industry linked PhD project studying the break-up of yield stress fluids. e.g clay.

current.name: James Downs
current.blurb: James is working on a PhD project looking at crystallization in 2D granular fluids.
